name: Classic Red Roses
description: A timeless bouquet of a dozen long-stemmed red roses. The ultimate romantic gesture, perfect for anniversaries, Valentine's Day, or just because.

name: Sunny Day Lilies
description: Brighten any room with this cheerful arrangement of vibrant yellow and white lilies. A wonderful gift to celebrate a friendship or send well wishes.

name: Pastel Dream Bouquet
description: A soft and elegant mix of pastel-colored tulips, hydrangeas, and seasonal greens. Ideal for birthdays, Mother's Day, or as a gentle token of sympathy.

name: Vibrant Tulip Mix
description: A burst of spring color! This bouquet features a lively assortment of fresh tulips in various shades. Perfect for celebrating a new beginning.

name: Wildflower Garden
description: A rustic and charming arrangement that captures the beauty of a meadow in bloom. Features a mix of daisies, lavender, and other seasonal wildflowers.

name: Elegant White Orchid
description: A sophisticated and long-lasting potted Phalaenopsis orchid. This graceful plant adds a touch of modern elegance to any home or office.
